channel.title: CVE Feed for nvidia -- NVIDIA GPU Display driver, vGPU driver, and Cloud gaming driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nvidia -- NVIDIA GPU Display driver, vGPU driver, and Cloud gaming driver

item.title: CVE-2023-31023|2024-09-05T14:35:02.376Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20gpu%20display%20driver%2C%20vgpu%20driver%2C%20and%20cloud%20gaming%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability where an attacker may cause a pointer dereference of an untrusted value, which may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-31020|2024-09-05T14:38:25.686Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20gpu%20display%20driver%2C%20vgpu%20driver%2C%20and%20cloud%20gaming%20driver
item.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where an unprivileged regular user can cause improper access control, which may lead to denial of service or data tampering.
